definition[0]: if you are rash, you do things too quickly, without thinking carefully about whether they are sensible or not
example[0]: Please Jessie, don’t do anything rash.
example[1]: Don’t go making any rash decisions about your future!
example[2]: It was rather rash of you to lend them your car.
definition[1]: a lot of red spots on someone’s skin, caused by an illness
note[0]: nappy rash British English,  diaper rash American English
example[3]: She had a nasty rash on her arm.
example[4]: Most babies get nappy rash at some stage.
example[5]: a heat rash (=a rash caused by heat)
example[6]: My mother comes out in a rash if she eats seafood.
